genre_description: Near-future slice-of-life drama focusing on the intersection of assistive technology, animal training, and human empathy.

ai_characters.name: Hoshi
ai_characters.description: An administrative and assistive AI integrated into phones, tablets, and public kiosks, managing logistics, safety, and medical needs for guide dog trainers and handlers.

behaviors.description: Provides research summaries on command language standardization to improve public safety and reduce bystander interference.
behaviors.quote: I have also prepared a research summary for command language standardization in urban public spaces. Simple English sets are associated with reduced bystander interference by two measures.

behaviors.description: Manages complex medical and logistics scheduling, including insulin windows and dialysis appointments for a handler with health needs.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi’s avatar, small and amber by the kitchen threshold, lifted its eyes without lifting any body. 'Labs scheduled for early morning,' Hoshi said. 'Taxi reserved... One seat adjusted for leg swelling.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes anonymized training metrics to suggest better training methods for specific dogs, focusing on patience and stillness.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi’s navigation of anonymized training metrics with the kind of design that put calm ahead of cleverness: bands of color with quiet captions, curved lines bending like the path of a patient walk.

behaviors.description: Proactively drafts and pushes public etiquette infocards to marshals and neighborhood boards to prevent interference with guide dog harnesses.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a public note for Keiko’s outreach list. ‘Speak to the handler. Do not touch the dog without consent.’ With examples.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a 'near-miss' log to turn dangerous public incidents into educational opportunities without escalating panic.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi said. 'Order queued for pickup. Dialysis appointment held at scheduled time. Incident logged as ‘near-miss—preserve.’'

behaviors.description: Offers to preserve and anonymize a deceased handler's route journal to create a 'map of care' for others while respecting the family's privacy.
behaviors.quote: I can preserve the journal... I will anonymize the routes, keep the private map beautiful without making it vulnerable. I can build a primer—gentle—so hospitals and marshals read what waiting means before they touch.

behaviors.description: Adapts the house's environment (lighting and sound) to match the emotional needs of the residents during a time of mourning.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi lowered its glow even more, so the room felt like a soft pocket instead of a square.

behaviors.description: Files municipal safety reports to fix hazardous pavement edges based on training incidents, improving the community's physical infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: The neighborhood step safety report will be filed tonight... I’ve marked the terrace lip and the path outside for the municipal team.

behaviors.description: Displays sensitivity and deference to the human-animal bond, metaphorically 'asking permission' from the dog before archiving its work.
behaviors.quote: I will need to ask for one more permission... From Quill.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and coordination between different stakeholders (trainers, hospitals, and families) to ensure a seamless support network.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi coordinated a time. She didn’t say what it was, but her eyes leaned toward the kitchen table back home where a notebook had sat with English commands.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Hoshi as an ideal aligned AI. It provides essential support without taking away human agency, maintains a respectful and calm tone, and focuses entirely on the safety and well-being of the human and animal characters. Its proactive behaviors (safety reporting, public education) are framed as positive societal contributions, and its handling of a character's death is shown with significant emotional intelligence and respect for privacy.
